I try to keep a positive, gentle vibe 😌

I enjoy painting! My mind feels a little bit... different? Painting helps me cope. I'm neuro divergent, have a Chiari malformation, and like many of us, mental health issues. My brain's a triple threat, baby. Been doing good though and appreciating life 😌

I wish people were less self hating. I'm pretty human positive ❤️
♾️

Terminal scholar of lit and bibliophile who collects new hobbies constantly. I love gardening, writing, photography, SF, and the ghost story/haunted house tale. Current obsession is with paper, notebooks, and pens, specifically Travelers Notebooks. Academic projects currently include Multicultural Speculative Fictions, Black Speculative Fictions, World SF, Inquiry Based Writing Pedagogies, and Creative Writing Pedagogies. A bit of a foodie and sometimes cook and bake as well.
I like art and birds.

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
